result.ga: An raibh tú ag an chóisir
result.orig: An raibh tú ag an chóisir
result.html: An raibh tú ag an chóisirWere you at the party?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ tú ag an ċóisirWere you at the party?

result.eng: We'll have a party next week.
result.ga: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.html: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainnWe'll have a party next week.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cóisir againn an tseaċtain seo ċugainnWe'll have a party next week.

result.eng: He threatened that he would pull his party out of government.
result.ga: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas
result.orig: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas
result.html: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtasHe threatened that he would pull his party out of government.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sé go dtarraingeoḋ sé a ṗáirtí amaċ as an rialtasHe threatened that he would pull his party out of government.

result.eng: They came home from the party.
result.html: Tháinig siad abhaile ón chóisirThey came home from the party.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad aḃaile ón ċóisirThey came home from the party.

result.eng: I am here as a representative of the party.
result.ga: Tá mé anseo mar ionadaí an pháirtí
result.orig: Tá mé anseo mar ionadaí an pháirtí
result.html: Tá mé anseo mar ionadaí an pháirtíI am here as a representative of the party.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé anseo mar ionadaí an ṗáirtíI am here as a representative of the party.

result.eng: Are you going to the party?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú ag dul ag an party
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ag dul ag an party
result.html: An bhfuil tú ag dul ag an partyAre you going to the party?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ag dul ag an partyAre you going to the party?

result.eng: Listen, will you be at my party?
result.ga: Cogar an mbeidh tú ag mo chóisir
result.orig: Cogar an mbeidh tú ag mo chóisir
result.html: Cogar an mbeidh tú ag mo chóisirListen, will you be at my party?
result.ponchtml: Cogar an mbeiḋ tú ag mo ċóisirListen, will you be at my party?

result.eng: When is the party taking place?
result.ga: Cén uair a bheidh an chóisir ar siúl
result.orig: Cén uair a bheidh an chóisir ar siúl
result.html: Cén uair a bheidh an chóisir ar siúlWhen is the party taking place?
result.ponchtml: Cén uair a ḃeiḋ an ċóisir ar siúlWhen is the party taking place?

result.eng: Would you like to come to my party?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisir
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisir
result.html: Ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisirWould you like to come to my party?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat teaċt ċuig mo ċóisirWould you like to come to my party?

result.eng: I was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.html: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag cuiṁneaṁ ba ḃreá liom a ḋul ċuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
